overview:
Aamcomp Computer Technology Oklahoma City, Oklahoma

They do it all!

From network security to design, and from implementation to analysis, they’ve got you covered on all aspects of setting up a computer network for your home, Corporate Office, Educational Institution, or Business, big or small.

Not sure what kind of network solution you need?

That’s why their here. Just explain to them what it is that your Computer network needs to accomplish and they will set you up with the perfect solution that suits your needs.

They Are!

Hewlett Packard Authorized Service & Sales - IBM Authorized Service & Sales

Lenovo Authorized Service & Sales - OKI data Authorized Service & Sales

Brother Authorized Service & Sales - Compaq Authorized Service & Sales

——————————————————————————– Services Include:

Network and Internet consulting, SOHO Solutions (Small Office and Home Office), ,Infrastructure needs ,Procurement and configuration of computer hardware ,Local Area Network (LAN) Design & Support ,Wide Area Network (WAN) Design & Support ,Project Management (Business or Corporate Office) ,Microsoft Windows NT Server and Workstation ,Installation and Support (computer) ,Microsoft Windows 2000 Professional, Server, and Advanced Server Support and Installation ,Heterogeneous Networks Support (NT, etc) ,Systems Management ,Web Server Design and Support OKC ,Internet Security and Design (Firewalls, NAT, Proxy, etc.) ,Internet Installation (xDSL, Cable Modem, etc.) ,Customer Needs Analysis ,Voice Over IP Solutions ,Network Security and Monitoring Analysis ,Cabling for CAT5 and CAT5e cables for homes, businesses, and ,educational ,institutions ,Citrix Server Solutions ,Terminal Server Support and Installation Virtual Private Networking (VPN) Support and Installation ,Data Backup (data protection and disaster recovery solutions) ,Aamcomp Cumputer Technology Oklahoma City
